course_description: In this seminar we will focus on developing models that capture key elements of human decision making. The goal is to develop skills related to combining psychological theory with empirical modeling techniques. The course is constructed around a 'live' dataset. We will use this data to develop skills related to data management and to explore the process of developing a research project.
prerequisites: This section is reserved for students in the PhD program.
schedule_location: T 11:30am-2:30pm in Goizueta Foundation Ctr W520
sections: Class Nbr: 6132, Section #: 5101, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: T 11:30a-2:30p, Instructor: M. Lewis, Status: Open
